# File lib/external_archive.rb, line 121
  def cache=(input)
    case
    when input && !cached?
      cache = io_index.to_a
      io_index.close
      @io_index = cache
      
    when !input && cached?
      io_index << {:format => 'II'}
      @io_index = ExternalIndex[*io_index]
      
    end
  end
